name: Strawberry Lemon Flax Seed Bread
description: Strawberry lemon flax seed bread. A delicious and healthy bread with your daily dose of omega- 3 fatty acid! Vegan Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 1.5 teaspoons quick rise yeast and .5 teaspoon active yeast

recipeInstructions.text: Warm 1/4 cup water and add 1 teaspoon sugar and yeast to it . Mix well and keep aside for 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Warm 1/4 cup water and add 1 teaspoon sugar and yeast to it . Mix well and keep aside for 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: Grease the mixer bowl and add in the flours, salt, sugar, crushed flaxseed. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease the mixer bowl and add in the flours, salt, sugar, crushed flaxseed. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Puree strawberries with little water and add to flour.
recipeInstructions.name: Puree strawberries with little water and add to flour.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the oil , 1/2 cup water and yeast mixture and knead for 10-12 minutes( batches of 3-4 minutes and then scrape the bowl and wait for the mixer to cool a little if too warm)
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the oil , 1/2 cup water and yeast mixture and knead for 10-12 minutes( batches of 3-4 minutes and then scrape the bowl and wait for the mixer to cool a little if too warm)

recipeInstructions.text: Add more water if needed. The strawberries will make the dough moist over time, so keep the dough a bit on the dry side.
recipeInstructions.name: Add more water if needed. The strawberries will make the dough moist over time, so keep the dough a bit on the dry side.

recipeInstructions.text: Dough should be soft and pliable and non sticky.
recipeInstructions.name: Dough should be soft and pliable and non sticky.

recipeInstructions.text: Place dough in well oiled container, covered with plastic wrap in a warm place for 1.5 hours
recipeInstructions.name: Place dough in well oiled container, covered with plastic wrap in a warm place for 1.5 hours

recipeInstructions.text: Punch dough down and knead for a minute. Shape into loaf by pulling on all side and tucking under.
recipeInstructions.name: Punch dough down and knead for a minute. Shape into loaf by pulling on all side and tucking under.

recipeInstructions.text: Place loaf in well oiled bread pan and cover with a kitchen towel. Let rise for half an hour. Bake loaf at 375 degrees F for 40 minutes or until it sounds hollow to touch.
recipeInstructions.name: Place loaf in well oiled bread pan and cover with a kitchen towel. Let rise for half an hour. Bake loaf at 375 degrees F for 40 minutes or until it sounds hollow to touch.

keywords: fruit bread, healthy bread recipe, vegan bread recipe
